item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - [Tidal] _ m.pokora - Oblivion | + a personal story
item.description:
Hey babes, i would appreciate it if someone could help me with this
https://tidal.com/browse/video/64035618
---------------------
Also, can i have this music video in any quality other than YouTube

Sex Indigo -Diana Diez and Kostas Martakis

---------------------
A short story about this video
i Am So happy right now i literally can't control myself!
I have finally found this video that I've been searching for,
for 3 years, 3 years of hoping
You have no idea how personal this situation was to me.
Years ago,had a flash drive with my favorite music videos in it because i didn't have a personal computer to archive my stuff;
Times were pretty rough those days and my mental health became to decline very bad due to some things i had to go through;
I went to a mental hospital for couple of weeks and i went through 12 session of ECT or Electroconvulsive therapy.
One of the major side effect of this procedure is memory loss and i lost a part of my memory that i haven't been able to recover after last 10 years and forgetting about many song names and lyrics was part of it.
Long story short, I lost my flash drive and i lost my memory and this song was forgotten for ever.
I've been trying to find it for years and yesterday, against all odds i finally found it!
Gosh I'm happy right now ))
It's a cool song you should check it out
Also look at this thread I posted it 3 years ago, lol
https://sharemania.us/threads/req-vid-help-me-find-this-video.124290/
P.s. sry abt my English
item.author: Aleejoon
